response_requirements.initial_response_description: Must provide cost estimate and access/copies of records, OR written denial with statutory citations, OR written explanation with earliest practicable date if extensive
response_requirements.final_response_notes: If extensive request, earliest practicable fulfillment date must be provided
response_requirements.extension_notes: For extensive/difficult requests, written explanation with earliest practicable date required

fee_structure.search_fee: Staff time for search and retrieval at actual cost
fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Cannot charge more than actual cost incurred
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Actual costs of copying - specific rates not specified in statute

exemptions.description: Personal information in files maintained for employees/officials
Records specifically exempted by other statutes

appeal_process.first_level: District court action for mandamus relief
appeal_process.first_level_notes: Administrative appeal to custodian's superior not required by statute
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Attorney fees may be available in some cases

requester_requirements.identification_notes: No specific identification requirements in statute
requester_requirements.reason_notes: No requirement to state purpose for request
requester_requirements.written_request_notes: Written requests recommended for documentation but not required

agency_obligations.response_options: Must provide one of three responses: records/cost estimate, written denial with citations, or extension with earliest practicable date
agency_obligations.denial_requirements: Must include description of withheld record contents and specific statutory citations
agency_obligations.fee_estimate_notes: Must provide cost estimate before fulfilling request

oversight_body.name: Attorney General
oversight_body.enforcement_authority: Limited to guidance; enforcement through district courts

validation_metadata.notes: Liberal construction standard particularly applies to fiscal records, audits, and public funds records
